cooking_method: Preheat grill or skillet to medium-high heat
Form ground beef into 4 equal patties and season with salt and pepper
Cook burgers for 3-4 minutes per side, until cooked through
Top each burger with a slice of cheese and allow to melt
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, onion, and desired condiments
Cook macaroni according to package instructions
In a separate saucepan, melt butter over medium heat
Whisk in flour to create a roux, then slowly whisk in milk
Cook mixture, stirring frequently, until thickened
Add salt, pepper, and cheddar cheese, stirring until cheese is melted and sauce is smooth
Combine macaroni and cheese sauce, stirring until well coated
Soak chicken in buttermilk for at least 30 minutes
In a separate bowl, mix together flour, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Dredge chicken pieces in flour mixture, shaking off excess
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Fry chicken in batches, turning occasionally, until golden brown and cooked through
Drain chicken on paper towels before serving
In a large pot, cook bacon over medium heat until crispy
Add onion and celery to the pot and saut√© until tender
Add potatoes and clam juice to the pot and bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer
